page.title: 20PADBURY AND HILLESDEN TODAY
page.content: The area here described could be called by some the heart of Britain by others a backwater of no importance. True there is little employment within the area, little unemployment too. The villages have their beginnings way back in time and are close to one of the country's newest cities. At a casual glance nothing ever seems to happen. If you take time to look there is so much to see and do. Some families are known to have been here for close to four hundred years others leave after less than four years. For most of us it is home, or home from home,and we wouldn't wish to move. CONTRIBUTORS Members of Steeple Claydon W.I. and Padbury W.I.
